A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Rian shows no restraint.

Couldn't resist putting in every possible joke\, a pointless Yoda cameo\, rushed earth-shattering twists\, and an ending that I still don't really know if I understand. What's more difficult to understand is how there are only 19 negative critic reviews of this tonally deficient movie. I loved Force Awakens\, but this takes so much potential and throws it back in our face\, almost mad at us for caring about questions like Snoke and Rey's backstory.

Well now I don't care anymore. Too bad.
